Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: OpenCms supports automatic PDF generation from XML contents. Via a special formatter-like JSP a PDF file is generated on the fly when rendering the JSP. The intended use-case is to render contents in a PDF file. But the concept is not limited to that use-case. You can also render information from different contents.
